Description
Lusha is growing and we are searching for a Marketing Designer to join our marketing team! If you are a skilled designer with strong web design skills, who is passionate about the craft of creative converting ideas and thrive in a fast-paced environment continue reading
What will you be doing?
As a Marketing Designer, you will focus on creating disruptive assets that accelerate Lusha’s growth as part of our demand generation efforts.
You will:
Build and update marketing assets that overwhelm and engage our potential users
Construct creative concepts and communicate them in a clear way
Own brand design projects A-Z dealing with brand identity, UX/UI design, digital assets, and interaction design work
Work collaboratively within the marketing team to gather information, understand the end goals and strategize visual communication approaches, with the business goals in mind
Creative ownership of our website and landing pages - design page layouts, ensuring they are pixel-perfect, inspiring, and user-friendly
Plan design projects and build marketing assets that engage our potential users (Web, social media, email marketing, and internal branding)
Work closely with the acquisition team and monitor relevant KPIs to optimize the design toward success.
Translating product functionality and technical details into beautiful visuals
Ensure consistency with our brand voice, style, and tone.
Apply a performance-based approach to over-deliver KPIs.
You are:
Creative thinker. Able to clearly conceptualize ideas and deliver multiple executions to bring them to life.
Organized. Excellent organizational skills and ability to prioritize and meet deadlines.
Self-starter. Curious, fast learner, fast to respond, and hands-on.
Data-oriented. You like working with data and insights and pair that with your passion for users to generate balanced and thoughtful points of view on how to take our products to market.
Ambitious. You are eager to make an impact. You thrive in a fast-moving, dynamic, growth environment and are able to operate at the strategic level and the micro-detail to get things right.
A team player. You have great communication skills. You love working with people.
Adaptive. You understand different marketing platforms require different techniques.
Degree in Visual Communication – A must
A strong online design portfolio that consists of web-based marketing campaigns and strong graphic principles - A must
3+ years of experience in designing and developing innovative concepts for stunning campaigns across all channels - A must
Strong communication skills and a team-oriented approach
Ability to execute brand strategy into compelling marketing assets
Ability to communicate complex concepts through simplified visuals
Experienced in supporting multiple marketing channels at scale
Experienced in creating and optimizing digital marketing assets for lead generation purposes
Strong typography skills and attention to detail
Hands-on experience in Adobe Suite, Figma
A "people person," a team player with a 'can-do' attitude
Experienced in video editing & After Effects experience - a plus
Strong demonstrated Illustration skills - a plus
Why Lusha?
Lusha connects you to your most relevant potential customers by creating simple, self-served products that provide access to meaningful and insightful B2B data. We offer ways to leverage data as an enabler for better, smarter and faster conversions at every stage of the customer lifecycle. Lusha was named Top 100 G2 Best Software Company and Top 100 Fastest-Growing product in 2020. Based in the center of Tel Aviv, Lusha is a fast-growing startup that offers its 300+ employees the opportunity to take an active role in shaping the future of the company. While all of us are dedicated to that mission, we surely know how to have a good time.Show more Report

Tel- Aviv · Full-time
About The Position
We are looking for a talented UI Designer who is passionate about creation and creativity.
As a UI designer at Appdome, you should have strong user-centered design principles, an eye for detail, and the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams including marketing, sales, product design, and developers. Be involved in a wide range of projects – from creating sales materials to more traditional web design and marketing assets
Design cross-platform experiences, new layouts, visuals, and illustrations
Requirements:
1-2 years of proven experience in interactive design
A complete portfolio of visual design examples.
Advanced proficiency in visual design software, such as Figma & Adobe Creative Suite
Ability to work across the entire design flow: sketching concepts, design, prototyping, and implementation
Conceptual thinking both in visual and interactive design
Strong graphic design skills & a sense for extraordinary, pixel-perfect design solutions
Illustration skills - an advantage
Knowledge of HTML and CSS in design assets, WordPress - an advantage
Responsibilities:
Establish the look and feel for various interfaces, including the website
Work within brand guidelines to create layouts that reinforce a brand’s voice through its visual touch-points
Design logos, icons, and infographics
Juggle multiple projects while effectively managing timelines and expectations
Work with a component library
If you are a skilled designer with a passion for creating amazing user experiences, we want to hear from you!
Online portfolio / PDF – mandatory
Company Overview
Appdome’s mission is to protect every mobile app in the world and the people who use mobile apps in their lives and at work. Appdome provides mobile brands with the only patented, centralized, data-driven Mobile Cyber Defense Automation platform, delivering rapid no-code, no-SDK mobile app security, anti-fraud, anti-malware, anti-cheat, anti-bot implementations, configuration as code ease, Threat-Events™ threat-aware UI/UX control, ThreatScope™ Mobile XDR, and Certified Secure™ DevSecOps Certification in one integrated system.
With Appdome, mobile developers, cyber and fraud teams can accelerate delivery, guarantee compliance, and leverage automation to build, test, release and monitor the full range of cyber, anti-fraud, and other defenses needed in mobile apps from inside mobile DevOps and CI/CD pipeline.
Leading ﬁnancial, healthcare, m-commerce, consumer, and B2B brands use Appdome to upgrade mobile DevSecOps and protect Android & iOS apps, mobile customers, and mobile businesses globally.
Nice To Know
Our Israeli R&D site is located in Tel Aviv next to Hashalom train station.
Hybrid work model.
Flexible working hours.
Today, Appdome's customers use their platform to secure over 50,000+ mobile apps and with protection of over 1B mobile end users projected by the end of 2023.Show more Report

We Are:

Connecteam is a TLV-based startup that is rapidly growing.

Our mission and what our product is all about - is to change how 80% of the world's global workforce—the deskless workers, operate in their day-to-day job roles.

Our marketing team is growing, and we are looking for a marketing design wizard. We want you to join our marketing department at one of Israel's most promising startup companies!

You Are:

A creative person with real passion for design and outstanding conceptual and visual design skills.

A natural-born leader with engaging visual storytelling abilities, a deep knowledge of brand and design experience, and an understanding of digital marketing across multiple channels.

You enjoy working closely with marketing and creative teams in a fast-paced startup environment.

Ownership & Responsibilities:

Build and update marketing assets that overwhelm and engage our potential users and employees
Construct creative concepts and communicate them in a clear way
Own brand design projects A-Z dealing with brand identity, digital assets, and interaction design work
Collaborate with other stakeholders to gather information, understand the end goals and strategize visual communication approaches, with the business goals in mind
Creative ownership of our website and landing pages - design page layouts, ensuring they are pixel-perfect, inspiring, and user-friendly
Plan design projects and build marketing assets that engage our potential users (presentations, data visualization, newsletters, banners, etc.)
Work closely with the acquisition team and monitor relevant KPIs to optimize the design toward success, applying all learning to future work
Translating product functionality and technical details into beautiful visuals
Creating campaigns, ads & web pages for our paid acquisition and SEO activity
Qualifications:

Degree in Visual Communication – REQUIRED
A strong online design portfolio that consists of web-based marketing campaigns and strong graphic principles - REQUIRED
3+ years of experience in designing and developing innovative concepts for stunning material campaigns across all channels - REQUIRED
Strong communication skills and a team-oriented approach
Ability to execute brand strategy into compelling marketing materials
Ability to communicate complex concepts through simplified visuals
Experienced in supporting multiple marketing channels at scale
Experienced in creating and optimizing digital marketing assets for lead generation purposes
Strong typography skills and attention to detail
Hands-on experience in Adobe Suite, Figma
A "people person," a team player with a 'can-do' attitude
Familiarity with online marketing basic metrics & KPIs - Advantage!
Joining Connecteam Is The Smart Move:
We build our people up. Every team member is treated as a long-term investment and we recognize the value in always nurturing and training them so they can go above and beyond in their skills and job duties.
We make an impact on our customer's business. We are on a mission to provide managers of all business types and sizes with the tools they need to communicate, operate, engage, and run their deskless workforce. Our product offers them an effective and affordable solution to run their business.
We get the job done. Connecteam employees are passionate in executing their job duties so they can drive the company forward and provide real value to our customers.
We have fun! From weekly happy hours to holiday parties, we always enjoy each other's company (and good food, of course). Connecteam is like one big, happy family!
Everyone is welcome. Connecteam is committed to building an encouraging, caring, and supportive environment. We share a responsibility to support our team and enrich their lives.
Together we will shape the future of work!Show more Report
